title: Physical Instrument

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, confront a player. If they visit you tonight, you attack them, roleblock them, and clean them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you control The Psychopath, your attacks powerfully rampage if you have successfully confronted a player previously.
Kill Note Addition:
*"Get the hell out of my way."*

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure only you and your emotions remain.

desc:
Post 4962
*As hard as you can. Break doors, chains, and bones. Your body is just another tool.*
